thothbot.parallax.core.shared.lights
Class PointLight

java.lang.Object
  thothbot.parallax.core.shared.objects.Object3D
      thothbot.parallax.core.shared.lights.Light
          thothbot.parallax.core.shared.lights.PointLight
All Implemented Interfaces:
DimensionalObject
public class PointLight
extends Light

Affects objects using MeshLambertMaterial or MeshPhongMaterial. 

 PointLight light = new PointLight( 0xff0000, 1, 100 ); 
 light.position.set( 50, 50, 50 ); 
 getScene().add( light );

Author:
thothbot
